src.linalg

Just based on built-in types and functions, this module provides data types for vectors and csr-matrices as well as level 1 + 2 matrix vector operations to perform basic linear algebra computations.

Functions

average_vector(x)

Compute the result of the following matrix-vector product

csc_to_csr(A_csc, dim)

csc_to_dense(A, row_dim)

INPUT: A: matrix in csc format row_dim: its row dimension OUTPUT: A_dense: list in which each column is densely stored as list

diag_quad_csr(A, col_dim)

indices_of_occurences(liste, element)

get all indices where element appears in liste

inv_diag_quad_csr(A, col_dim)

INPUT: A: a quadratic (!) matrix in csr format col_dim: its col dimension OUTPUT: D^{-1}: the inverse of the diagonal matrix D in csr format (D = diag(A.diagonal()))

matmat(A, B)

matvec(A, x)

computes the matrix vector product INPUT: A: (mxn) matrix x: n-dim vector like OUTPUT: A*x: matrix-vector product

norm(x[, order])
